amendment.description: To increase veterans medical care by $410,000,000 in fiscal year 2006.

vote.text: Amendment SA 171 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 4. Record Vote Number: 54.

action.text: Amendment SA 171 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2724-2726; text: CR S2724) To increase veterans medical care by $410,000,000 in fiscal year 2006.
